name: Super Turbo Killer Car Rampage
description:
Super Turbo Killer Car Rampage

A self-driving car has gone rouge in the streets of Florida. Nobody is inside, so surely nothing bad will happen...

(Try downloading the standalone build if you are having performance issues with the web build)

Controls:

AD or Arrow Keys = Movement

Q = Look back

X = Skip opening cutscene

Credits:

kekis - Programming

Iiro - Art

Hugo - Music and SFX
